The City of Caldwell has adopted the following fees:

* [TABC Licenses and Permit Fees](javascript:;)
  - City of Caldwell Fees are in the far right column under "Maximum Local Fee"

As the financial epicenter of our vibrant city, our department is committed to providing exceptional financial services to support the growth and well-being of our community. We offer a comprehensive range of services tailored to meet the diverse needs of residents, businesses, and government entities. From budget planning and forecasting to investment management and debt administration, we work diligently to ensure transparency, efficiency, and accountability in all financial matters.

**Acting as a point of contact for all financial services:**

* Preparing annual City budget and financial statement documents
* Processing payments for vendors of the City
* Maintaining records of daily transactions
* Completing bi-weekly employee payroll
